text: Ritchiella is a genus of grasshoppers in the subfamily Cyrtacanthacridinae with species found in Africa.Mungai. 1992. Tropical Zoology 5(2):262, 265. == Species == The following species are recognised in the genus Ritchiella: * Ritchiella asperata (Bolívar, 1882) * Ritchiella baumanni (Karsch, 1896) * Ritchiella rungwensis Mungai, 1992 * Ritchiella sanguinea (Sjöstedt, 1912) * Ritchiella uvarovi (Sjöstedt, 1924) == References == Category:Acrididae
title: Ritchiella
